import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Header from "./Header"; import "./css/Page1.css"; import circle1 from '../src/image/page1.png'; import DropFileInput from "./components/drop-file-input/DropFileInput"; import ImgDrop from "./components/drop-file-input/ImgDrop"; import plus from "./image/plus.png"; import PlusPage from './components/PlusPage'; import next from "./image/right.png"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Page1() { const [works, setWorks] = useState([{}]); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', id: '', contact: '' }); // 출품자 정보 const updateWorkInfo = (index, data) => { const updatedWorks = [...works]; updatedWorks[index] = { ...updatedWorks[index], ...data }; setWorks(updatedWorks); }; const handleFormDataChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; return (
